name: Solvaris Order Core
desc: Order Core is a military modspec that enhances a ship's combat and logistical capabilities by increasing ground support by %s, extending ballistic and energy weapon range by %s while extending point-defense range by %s, improving fleet mobility with a %s boost to maximum burn level, raising maintenance crew requirements by %s, and reducing the ordnance cost of large ballistic weapons by %s.
short: Order Core is a military modspec that enhances combat and logistics, boosting ground support, weapon range, fleet mobility, and reducing large ballistic ordnance costs while increasing crew requirements.

name: Solvaris Prime Doctrine
desc: The Principles Core is an experimental hullmod that enhances a ship's combat capabilities across multiple aspects. It increases ballistic and energy ammo reserves by %s, expands missile capacity by %s, and prolongs peak performance time by %s. Combat readiness degradation is reduced by %s, while solar shielding minimizes environmental hazards by %s. Defensive systems are reinforced, reducing energy damage taken by %s, improving shield turn rate by %s, and accelerating shield deployment by %s. Additionally, turret gyros are refined, enhancing turret rotation speed by %s, ensuring superior precision in battle.
short: Principles Core enhances ship endurance, firepower, and defenses boosting ammo reserves, missile capacity, shields, and turret response for peak combat efficiency.

name: Solvaris Grid
desc: Solvaris ships are hardwired into the Argent battle network. Grants %s EMP resistance %s weapon range and %s flux dissipation.

name: Flux-Shunt Coils
desc: Advanced phase capacitors that allow for rapid cycling. Increases phase speed by %s reduces cooldown by %s and improves flux dissipation by %s.

name: Photonic Aggregator
desc: Focuses beam emitters through a hyper-lens array. Increases beam damage by %s range by %s and turret turn speed by %s.

name: Argent Drone Link
desc: Hardwires fighter control systems into the Argent network. Increases fighter replacement rate by %s engagement range by %s and reduces crew requirements by %s.

name: Primordial Regeneration
desc: This organism possesses a violent survival instinct. It repairs hull tissue at %s per second, and weapon mounts %s faster. If the hull is critically damaged, regeneration accelerates up to %s normal speed.

name: Primordial Synapse
desc: The central nervous system of this organism operates at superluminal speeds. It grants %s maneuverability, %s weapon range, and accelerates the ship's temporal flow by %s, allowing it to react faster than physics should allow. The synaptic precision reduces weapon recoil to %s.

name: Primordial Carapace
desc: The hull of this vessel is not built, but grown. It possesses a primordial regeneration factor allowing it to regrow distinct armor plates mid-combat. The non-conductive carapace reduces High Explosive damage by %s, EMP damage by %s, and regenerates %s of its armor matrix every minute.

name: Primordial Instinct
desc: This organism has evolved a symbiotic neural interface that actively communicates with its pilot. It analyzes combat conditions to shift between three biological imperatives: Predatory +%s Damage/RoF, Survival +%s Speed, +%s Maneuverability, and Tactical +%s Flux Dissipation, +%s Range.
